LanguageData.AYHenbaneJoint.label: Henbane joint
LanguageData.AYHenbaneJoint.description:
Henbane leaves prepared in small rolls for smoking. Henbane use increases aggressiveness, increases appetite, but can be useful for pain relief. Henbane use can produce a dependency.
Joints can be produced at a crafting spot without equipment, and are a fixture in many traditional low-industriousness cultures.
